doc.title: 2 Smart Blondes
doc.plot: Once upon a time there were two girls. One was an American. One was Canadian. One was a lawyer, turned comedian, the other a broadcaster turned comedian. Separately they're funny, but together they're "2 Smart Blondes". "Two Smart Blondes" features Maggie Cassella and Carla Collins, who collectively have interviewed more people than the human resources department at Enron. These women bring their wit and savvy for a blonde highlights look at the year in entertainment. Who died, who divorced, who drove drunk and who slept with whom - it's all here! No celebrity stone(d) is left unturned!

No celebrity stone(d) is left unturned!
